yoshida.shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • yoshida.shapes.Shapes
      • yoshida.shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shapes
    Models a Circle
    Version:
    9/22/15
    Author:
    Ryan Yoshida

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle()
      Creates a default instance of a Circle with all fields set to zero meaning it is set at point (0,0) and has radius 0 and default fill and stroke black and strokeWeight 1
      Circle(double x, double y, double radius)
      Creates a new instance of circle with center set at point (x, y) and a radius default color black, stroke black, weight 1
      Circle(double x, double y, double radius, java.awt.Color fill, java.awt.Color stroke, double strokeWeight) 

    • Method Summary

      Draws the Circle based on the x and y coordinates and the radius with ellipseMode(CENTER)

      Calculates and returns the area of the Circle

      Calculates and returns the perimeter of the Circle

      Get method to find the center of the Circle

      Get method to find radius of the Circle

      Takes in the parameter of another circle and determines if this circle intesects the other circle

      Takes in the parameters double x, double y and determines if these points are inside the circle

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates a default instance of a Circle with all fields set to zero meaning it is set at point (0,0) and has radius 0 and default fill and stroke black and strokeWeight 1

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius)
        Creates a new instance of circle with center set at point (x, y) and a radius default color black, stroke black, weight 1
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - y-coordinate of the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius,
              java.awt.Color fill,
              java.awt.Color stroke,
              double strokeWeight)
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - y-coordinate of the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        fill - color to fill the circle
        stroke - color to draw the circle outline
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the stroke

        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the Circle

        double the perimeter of the Circle

        public double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the Circle

        double - the area of the Circle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Takes in the parameters double x, double y and determines if these points are inside the circle
        Parameters:
        x - double x-coordinate of the point to check
        y - double y-coordinate of the point to check
        Returns:
        a boolean whether the point is inside the circle

      • intersect

        public boolean intersect(Circle other)
        Takes in the parameter of another circle and determines if this circle intesects the other circle
        Parameters:
        other - Another Circle that is compared against this circle for intersection
        Returns:
        a boolean whether the circles do intersect
        Precondition:
        other must not be null
        Postcondition
        returns true if tangency occurs

      • move

        public void move(int x,
                 int y)
        Moves the Circle x amount along the x-axis and y amount along the y-axis
        Parameters:
        x - amount to move on x-axis
        y - amount to move on y-axis

      • drawText

        public void drawText(java.lang.String str,
                     processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the text at the center of the circle
        Parameters:
        str - the string to draw
        marker - the PApplet to draw on
        Postcondition
        textSize is set to 12, textAlign is set to (CENTER, CENTER), fill is set to 0 or Black

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the Circle based on the x and y coordinates and the radius with ellipseMode(CENTER)
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shapes
        Parameters:
        marker - PApplet used to draw on
        Postcondition
        fill is set to BLACK, textAlign is set to CENTER, ellipseMode is set to CENTER, fill is set to noFill, stroke is set to noStroke, strokeWeight is set 0

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Get method to find radius of the Circle
        Returns:
        double - the radius of the circle

        Get method to find the center of the Circle
